pages.text: We are going to brand him on the nose
Indeed We test them as We tested the owners of the garden when they swore that they shall pick it in the morning
with no exceptions
Then a disaster, from your Master, came to it while they were sleep
so it became as like a totally picked field
Then they called one another in the morning
(saying): go to your crop early if you are pickers
so they went on, and they were talking softly (saying)
no poor shall enter it over you today
And they went out early determined and capable
Then when they saw it they said: we are lost
no, but we are deprived
The fairest of them said: did I not tell you, why do you not glorify (God)
They said: our Master is flawless, indeed we were wrongdoers
So they turned on each other blaming one another
They said: woe to us, indeed we were rebellious
Perhaps our Master gives us better than that in exchange, indeed we are fond of our Master
That is how the punishment is, and the punishment of the hereafter is certainly greater, if they knew
Indeed there are gardens of delight for those who control themselves with their Master
Should We place the submitted ones the same as the guilty ones
What is with you, how do you judge (like this)
Do you have a book that you study from it
and indeed whatever you choose is in it for you
Or do you have any vows (binding) on Us, reaching to the resurrection day, that whatever you judge is yours
Ask them which one of them guarantees this
Or do they have associates? Then let them bring their associates if they are truthful
On a day when leg is bared (and the deeds are exposed) and they are called to the prostration, but they cannot
